name: Rainyworms
description:
Rainyworms

It just started raining! Hurry and dig up to the surface before you drown.

This game was made for the 20 second game jam 2022 (which is also the first ever game jam I participated in)

The levels get progressively more difficult the further you come. Hard mode uses reduced speed and increased obstacle size, and you can get stuck on obstacles which slows you down a lot.

Controls (mouse): Left click to move towards cursor. You can also use the arrow keys on your keyboard, or "A" + left stick on your controller.

I might add a larger variety of obstacles in the future to make the game more entertaining.

Thx for playing & I'm waiting for your feedback :-)
